description.para: Resumes a thread that has been suspended.

tr.td: Function succeeds in resuming a thread that has been suspended or decrements the count of threads that want to suspend the associated thread.
The thread did not enter suspend state.

remarks.para: If the thread is not already suspended, this method has no effect and return E_INVALID_OPERATION. If there is other thread which has suspended the associated thread, this method decrements the count of threads that want to suspend the associated thread.
